sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script for Procurement Common Architecture</description>
        <name>PSM Dictionary Upgrade (Feb 2023)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_invoice^element=subtotal',
        'attribute': {
            'read_only': false
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_line^element=services_ack',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Acknowledgement type'
        }
    }
];
var choiceArr = [
	{
        'query': 'element=services_ack^name=sn_shop_line^value=invoice_approval',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Service Acknowledgement'
        }
    }
];
var docArr = [
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_invoice_task^elementISEMPTY',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Service Acknowledgment',
            'plural': 'Service Acknowledgments'
        }
    }
];
function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}
function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}
function updateChoice(ChoiceObj) {
    var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    choiceGr.addEncodedQuery(ChoiceObj.query);
    choiceGr.query();
    while (choiceGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(choiceGr, ChoiceObj.attribute);
}

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);
docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-10-04 21:27:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>df504ada77d21110b3f3dbe5ba5a99fc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PSM Dictionary Upgrade (Feb 2023)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_df504ada77d21110b3f3dbe5ba5a99fc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-10-19 13:47:04</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
